title: Event Recommendation for Social Engagement
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide personalized recommendations for social events based on my patients' interests so that I can encourage them to engage socially and prevent isolation.

title: Social Connection Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to remind my patients of their upcoming social engagements so that they can maintain regular communication with friends and family, which helps prevent social isolation.

title: Group Communication Features
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to facilitate group messaging and video calls among my patients, their families, and myself so that we can promote community and connection, reducing social isolation.

title: Activity Tracking and Feedback
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track my patients' participation in social activities and gather feedback on their experiences so that I can provide better support and recommendations for their social engagement.

title: Social Media Integration
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to link my patients' social media accounts to ALFRED so that I can facilitate easier communication and sharing of events, helping to reduce their social isolation.
